title: [Self-Directed] Adoption Factors Analysis of PhET Simulations in Science and Mathematics Education: Adult Learner-Tailored Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental digital tools and general familiarity with educational technology (EdTech)
context.additional_context: Course exploring PhET simulation applications in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Non-degree program for working professionals emphasizing practical applicability

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥3 criteria for evaluating the pedagogical utility of PhET simulations.
Learners can identify ≥2 technical requirements for running PhET simulations in smartphone environments.
Learners can analyze ≥2 organizational support conditions when introducing simulations as educators/instructors.

resources: Offline manual for improving technological accessibility
Case study: Educational technology adoption in developing countries
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
